fields.name: Snoop:
fields.value: Choose a player who scored below you in the previous Evening and learn their feedback message at the end of this night.

fields.name: Delivery!:
fields.value: Once per Day, submit a full list of each player and the feedback message you think they received last night. You will learn the number of messages that were correct. If you scored at least 50% in the previous Evening, you may submit a second list. If you scored at least 75%, you may submit a third. Regardless of which guesses were correct or incorrect, once you submit your last guess,  each player will receive the message you assigned to them.

fields.name: Mail Service (Passive):
fields.value: At the end of each night, you will receive a randomly ordered list of every player's feedback message, without knowing which player each one belongs to. No effect can prevent you from seeing this list, except for you being dead. If a player would receive multiple feedback messages that night, they will be combined into a single message on your list. Every player will not see any feedback message that they normally would, and you won't know which message in your list is yours. Your list will be the only source of feedback.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Submit at least a single list where every feedback message is assigned to the correct player.
